Kubernetes¶

Contents:

  • Install Nodejs and npm
    • How to Install Node.js and npm on Debian 10 Linux
  • Install and Set Up kubectl
    • Install and Set Up kubectl on Linux
  • Personalizing containers with dotfile repositories
    • Check typical tools are installed, SSH and Git
    • Install Dotfiles Repository - share git credentials with containers
  • Install Docker
    • Install Docker Engine on Debian
    • Hello World Docker to validate correct setup
    • Run a Docker Sample nodejs express
    • Fixing ‘Got permission denied while trying to connect to the Docker daemon socket’ error with Docker
  • Install a Docker image with DigitalOcean Kubernetes and doctl
  • Install doctl DigitalOcean CLI
    • Get doctl for Docker
  • Get a token from DigitalOcean

Goals¶

  • Install Node.js and npm

  • Install and Set Up kubectl

Docker Hub¶

https://hub.docker.com/

Kubernetes Quickstart¶

https://www.digitalocean.com/docs/kubernetes/quickstart/

Getting Started with Kubernetes: A kubectl Cheat Sheet¶
